data.prayer: Spirit, please convict each believer in North Bahr-al-Ghazal, South Sudan to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 471,633 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.location_label: Photo from the state of North Bahr-al-Ghazal, South Sudan
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in North Bahr-al-Ghazal to agree with you and with one another.
Lord, like in the church of Antioch, where you gathered many prophets and teachers, please gather many prophets and teachers in the state of North Bahr-al-Ghazal, South Sudan.
data.verse: Now in the church at Antioch there were prophets and teachers: Barnabas, Simeon called Niger, Lucius of Cyrene, Manaen (who had been brought up with Herod the tetrarch), and Saul.

data.prayer: Spirit, sanctify the 57,467 believers in North Bahr-al-Ghazal and keep them blameless until Jesus returns.
data.verse: May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ. He who calls you is faithful, who will also do it.

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Njalgulgule people. Make the Njalgulgule people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Spirit, teach those feeling unsafe in North Bahr-al-Ghazal, South Sudan that they can hide under your wings
data.verse: He will cover you with his feathers, and under his wings you will find refuge; his faithfulness will be your shield and rampart.

data.prayer: Father, please make every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the state of North Bahr-al-Ghazal.
Father, help the 57,467 believers in North Bahr-al-Ghazal to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 471,633 lost friends and neighbors.
